title: Jose A. Guevara - FullStack Developer
description: Professional portfolio of Jose A. Guevara, Junior FullStack Developer
professional_profile: I am a junior full stack developer passionate about technology and software development, with experience in React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Laravel. I enjoy learning and experimenting with new technologies, as well as sharing my knowledge. I specialize in building efficient, scalable, and well-designed web applications, applying best practices and writing clean code. I am proactive, analytical, and highly motivated to continue growing professionally.

languages.description: Mother tongue, full proficiency in all contexts
Able to hold technical conversations, read documentation, and write professional emails

experiences.title: FullStack Developer - Newbie (Spotify-like Application)
experiences.description: Collaborated with a team to develop a music streaming application using React and Tailwind CSS, creating an attractive and functional user interface with features such as playlists, music playback, and user customization.

experiences.title: FullStack Developer - Restaurant Management Application
experiences.description: Worked in a team to develop an ASP.NET application to manage restaurants, including the administration of recipes, menus, and orders, with a focus on optimizing user experience and operational efficiency.

experiences.title: Backend Developer - Hospital Management Application
experiences.description: Contributed to the development of a Java application for comprehensive hospital management, including functionalities such as hospital listings, adding new records, updating existing data, and deleting hospitals.

projects.title: Here2There Kids
projects.description: Developed an educational mobile application in Flutter aimed at children, implementing an interactive visual scenario where a toy vehicle moves from a starting point to a destination. Integrated animations and optimized graphic resources to provide a playful and engaging experience.

projects.title: Icon Plus Explorer
projects.description: Built a mobile application in Flutter to explore the icon_plus package. Implemented an efficient search system to quickly locate specific icons and programmed the functionality to display the exact name of the selected icon for integration in Flutter projects.

projects.title: Checklist (Notion-like Application)
projects.description: Developed a checklist application using React for the frontend and Laravel for the backend. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and view tasks.

projects.title: Eduvote (Student Voting System)
projects.description: Designed and developed a web platform where students can vote for political parties within their educational institution. It includes authentication, real-time results, and an administration system to manage elections.

projects.title: Newbie (Spotify-like Application)
projects.description: Developed an application that allows users to search for artists and view albums using the Spotify API. Users can explore music and albums from different artists.

projects.title: Hospital Management Application
projects.description: The system includes functionalities such as listing hospitals, adding new records, updating existing ones, and deleting hospitals.

projects.title: Restaurant Management Application
projects.description: Worked in a team to develop an ASP.NET application to manage restaurants, including recipes, menus, and ingredients, focusing on user experience and best practices.
